response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which we believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its high value and unique features, it is worth $15,000 to us. However, considering its worth to you and the potential benefits it could bring, we are offering it to you for $12,000. This represents a significant saving for you while still allowing us to cover our costs and ensure a fair return on our investment. We hope this offer aligns with your expectations and looks forward to discussing how this product can enhance your operations. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 12000}
